hero.subtitle: Discover your dream home in the most sought-after locations

about_hero.title:
Building Your Future,
One Home at a Time
about_hero.subtitle: We're more than just a property platform - we're your partner in finding the perfect place to call home.

about_mission.mission_description: To provide a transparent and efficient property rental experience for all users. We strive to make the process of finding your perfect home as seamless as possible, while maintaining the highest standards of service and integrity.
about_mission.vision_description: Empowering millions of users to find their perfect home with ease and trust. We envision a future where property search is not just about finding a place to live, but about discovering a community to belong to.

about_values.title: Our Values
about_values.subtitle: These core values guide everything we do at OurHome
about_values.trust_description: We verify all property owners and renters to ensure a safe and reliable experience for everyone.
about_values.transparency_description: Clear and honest property listings with accurate information and no hidden fees.
about_values.efficiency_description: Streamlined property search and listing process to save you time and effort.

about_benefits.title: Why Choose OurHome?
about_benefits.subtitle: Experience the difference with our comprehensive property solutions
about_benefits.verified_properties_description: Every property is thoroughly verified for quality and security.
about_benefits.user_friendly_platform_description: Intuitive navigation and seamless property management.
about_benefits.support_description: Round-the-clock assistance for all your queries.
about_benefits.comprehensive_listings_description: Wide range of properties to match every need and budget.

about_milestone.title: Our Journey So Far
about_milestone.subtitle: Milestones that mark our growth and success

contact_hero.title: Get in Touch With Us
contact_hero.subtitle: Have questions about our properties? Need assistance with finding your perfect home? Our team is here to help you every step of the way.

steps.testimonial_quote: The 3-step process was incredibly smooth. Within a week, I found and secured my dream apartment!

companies.description: Join thousands of successful companies that rely on our platform for their real estate needs
companies.trusted_choice: From startups to Fortune 500 companies, we're the trusted choice
companies.start_journey: Start your journey with industry-leading companies today
companies.neighborhood_analysis_desc: Every property automatically includes a detailed neighborhood report showing nearby schools, hospitals, shopping centers, restaurants, and fitness facilities with walking/driving times.
companies.interactive_map_desc: Explore properties on a satellite map view with clickable markers, property details popups, and location-based search with radius filtering.
companies.advanced_search_desc: Powerful filtering system with property type, price range sliders, bedrooms/bathrooms, square footage, amenities, and availability options.
companies.user_dashboard_desc: Manage your properties, track views and likes, handle appointments, add new listings with step-by-step wizard, and monitor performance.
companies.appointment_management_desc: Schedule property viewings, manage appointment status, send meeting links, and track all viewing requests in one place.
companies.property_listing_desc: Easy property addition with guided steps, multiple image uploads, map location picker, and comprehensive property details form.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.heading: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Discover why homeowners trust OurHome to find their perfect property

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.text: Found my dream home through OurHome. The process was seamless and their team was incredibly helpful throughout the entire journey.

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.text: Exceptional service! Their attention to detail and understanding of our needs made house hunting a breeze. They found us the perfect property in a competitive market.

emily.name: Emily Rodriguez
emily.text: Professional team that goes above and beyond. They helped us find the perfect property within our budget and negotiated a better price than we expected.

david.name: David Wilson
david.text: OurHome's AI property recommendations were spot-on! I found exactly what I was looking for in half the time I expected. Their technology is truly impressive.

priya.name: Priya Patel
priya.text: The virtual tours saved me so much time. I was relocating from another state, and OurHome made the entire process stress-free with their detailed property insights.

james.name: James Martinez
james.text: What impressed me most was how transparent they were about every property. No surprises at all, and their support team was always available to answer my questions.

about_team.title: Meet Our Team
about_team.subtitle: The passionate individuals behind OurHome's success

oussema.name: Oussema Ben AYed
oussema.bio: With 15+ years in real estate, Oussema leads our vision of transforming property search.

boston.name: Boston New York
boston.bio: Tech innovator driving our platform's cutting-edge solutions.
